author: cms-sw
body:
Changed dip build to use `cmake` to build it. `conan` download `log4cplus` sources during the build which mean re-build of dip might fail due to conan server issues ( as we have seen https://github.com/cms-sw/cmsdist/pull/7353 )
- added `log4cplus` as separate package and build with cmake
- build dip and platform-dependent using cmake
title: build dip with cmake instead of conan
